title: The Homework Excuse
story: May I turn in my homework tomorrow? It's due today. I know, but I don't have it right now. How come? Your dog ate it? No! I left it at home. I can't take your word for it. Why not? I'm an A+ student. How do I know if you even did the homework? I'll ask my mom to take a picture of it and send it to me. That's fair enough. Thanks. Also, you should try trusting students more. We're not all that bad. I'll try, but I can't promise anything.
summary: A student tries to come up with an excuse for not having their homework, leading to a humorous conversation with their teacher.
image: A student holding an empty backpack with a confused expression.
